statements: DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 1 AND energy_usage_kwh < 1000.50;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE consumption_date <= '2022-05-31' AND facility_location LIKE '%New York%';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-05-10';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption_data WHERE facility_id = 2 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM buildings WHERE facility_id = 3 AND building_size_sqft < 5000;
